section.title: Removing a Widget
section.para: You can remove a widget when you no longer need the widget to be displayed in the dashboard.

step.para:
From the widget that you want to remove, click
(Remove from Dashboard) in the upper right corner of the widget.

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: The widget is removed from the dashboard, but it is not deleted. It can be added again if needed.
